text: Bayerischer Rundfunk is the main German radio and television broadcasting company for Bavaria. It is a member of the ARD public broadcasting group. It includes the following broadcasting services: the radio stations * Bayern 1 * Bayern 2 * Bayern 3 * BR-Klassik * BR Schlager * BR24 * BR24live * BR Puls (only available via the Internet and DAB / Astra 19,2 East ) and the TV channels * Bayerisches Fernsehen * ARD-Î±lpha File:BR Dachmarke.svg|The logo of the Bayerischer Rundfunk File:Bayerisches Fernsehen (2007).svg|The logo of the TV channel Bayerisches Fernsehen Category:German broadcasting companies Category:Companies based in Munich
title: Bayerischer Rundfunk
